programme.title: Special Monster
programme.desc: Gao Cheng set sail in search of an ancient ship carrying countless treasures that mysteriously vanished, only to end up on a mysterious island inhabited by a primitive tribe & alien creatures.

programme.title: Desert Lone Hero
programme.desc: The fight for a mystical treasure begins after the death of Shen Shijie, the world's richest businessman, who built an impenetrable vault to seal up his huge wealth.

programme.title: Detective Dee And The Punished Swellhead
programme.desc: When a mysterious curse causes people to undergo physical changes or be devoured by demonic beings, detective Dee is tasked with finding out the truth & to resolve the impossible curse.

programme.title: Lost Identity Ep16
programme.desc: Top spy couple Huang Jing Yu and Xin Zhi Lei join forces! Ou Xiao'an escapes a Japanese biochemical lab and teams up with Qian Mo Qing to uncover secrets and expose Japanese spies.

programme.title: Lost Identity Ep17
programme.desc: Top spy couple Huang Jing Yu and Xin Zhi Lei join forces! Ou Xiao'an escapes a Japanese biochemical lab and teams up with Qian Mo Qing to uncover secrets and expose Japanese spies.

programme.title: The White Olive Tree Ep01
programme.desc: While reporting in the war-torn East Nation, journalist Song Ran encounters danger. She's rescued by Li Zan, a Chinese explosives engineer volunteering there. His gentle heart deeply attracts Song Ran.

programme.title: The White Olive Tree Ep02
programme.desc: While reporting in the war-torn East Nation, journalist Song Ran encounters danger. She's rescued by Li Zan, a Chinese explosives engineer volunteering there. His gentle heart deeply attracts Song Ran.

programme.title: Hunting Ep23
programme.desc: Narcotics officer Yang Yi Peng join hands with rookie officer Zhi An and informant Duo Zai to trace a drug source link, exposing a cross-border cartel and the mastermind behind it.

programme.title: Hunting Ep24
programme.desc: Narcotics officer Yang Yi Peng join hands with rookie officer Zhi An and informant Duo Zai to trace a drug source link, exposing a cross-border cartel and the mastermind behind it.

programme.title: Fated Hearts Ep09
programme.desc: A red-clad archer & the rival prince meet through political conflicts, turning mutual use to true devotion. Blending court intrigue & martial arts, revenge & growth, with both sweet & bitter emotions.

programme.title: Fated Hearts Ep10
programme.desc: A red-clad archer & the rival prince meet through political conflicts, turning mutual use to true devotion. Blending court intrigue & martial arts, revenge & growth, with both sweet & bitter emotions.

programme.title: Footprints Of Change Ep30
programme.desc: Set in the 1930s, the story spans 3 generations of the Lin family, through their struggles & choices, portraying their growth, transformation & emotional bonds across different eras.

programme.title: The Strange Snake Story In Shangtong Village
programme.desc: To protect a magical flower from being seized by Japanese invaders, a young man and his friends strategizes against the the soldiers to eliminate them and to protect the treasure in the cave.

programme.title: Deep Lurk Ep31
programme.desc: During WW2, under the leadership of the Communist Party, Yun Hong Shen joined forces with patriotic youth Wen Ye Ming to uncover the Japanese spies hidden within the Nationalist army.

programme.title: Deep Lurk Ep32
programme.desc: During WW2, under the leadership of the Communist Party, Yun Hong Shen joined forces with patriotic youth Wen Ye Ming to uncover the Japanese spies hidden within the Nationalist army.

programme.title: My Wife's Double Life Ep01
programme.desc: Adapted from a novel by author Yan Nong, a thief is tasked with finding implicating proof against a minister, only for her to marry and fall in love with the minister's son.
